items.health_discussions:
Asked Team if any issues in building regarding the compromising of their health - 
They all responded No.
items.safety_discussions: TN - Every body has blocked off the aircon - TB Guest coming into the office - The aircon is being switched off - The Staff should not be switching the aircon off rather wear a jersey if feeling cold. Sanitizer to be reintroduced after the Foot and mouth disease outbreak.
items.environment_discussions: Today Pest Control guys Came without Notification - Hamza was informed Yesterday and did not inform his team.
